title: ref guide updates for new "nori" analyis module for Korean
description:
LUCENE-8231 added a new "nori" analysis module – similar for the "Kuromoji" module but for Korean text.

We should update the ref guide to mention how to use the new module & configure the new Factories.

comments.content: There is also the problem that the JAR file is not shipped with Solr 7.4, as it is missing in analysis-extras. Schema files is also missing example (in contrast to Kuromoji).
comments.author: Uwe Schindler

comments.content:
OK, the documentation in Lucene was updated. Also example text fragments were added to Solr's schema. The JAR file is also shipped with solr now.

Only the ref guide updates are missing. I am not familar with asciidoc, so somebody with experience should do this. Text fragments can be collected from schema files and Lucene's documentation.
comments.author: Uwe Schindler
